eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException

Class NeverGreenException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException.TrafficLightException
          • eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException.NeverGreenException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NeverGreenException
extends TrafficLightException
    This Exception will be thrown if a request for remaining red cannot be replied since the traffic light will be never green.
    Author:
    Rafael Math
